resources.string: replace this with something else this is a test
Starting from the person who drew the ace, drink until the person who precedes you stops!
Bad luck! You have to drink.
Last person to touch the floor drinks. Go go go!
Last person to bring their hands up drink. Hands up!
Pick someone to drink with you. Every time you drink, they must also!
Pick a word/phrase. The first person that can\'t make a rhyme from it drinks.
Pick a category. The first person that can\'t make name a member of the category drinks. (e.g colors, dog breeds, etc)
Make a rule that if broken by someone, the person must drink.
You are the quiz master. If anyone answers your questions, they must drink. There can only be one quizmaster at a time.
Everyone must pour some of their drink into the king\'s cup. If this is the last king, you must drink it!
